birthChartCalculator.title: Birth Chart Calculator
birthChartCalculator.editDescription: Update the details for your saved chart.
birthChartCalculator.description: Enter birth details for a personalized cosmic blueprint.
birthChartCalculator.searchPlaceholder: Search charts by name, date, or location...
birthChartCalculator.noChartsFound: No charts found matching your search.
birthChartCalculator.noSavedCharts: You have no saved charts yet.
birthChartCalculator.generatedChartDescription: View, download, or share your chart below.
birthChartCalculator.deleteChartConfirmation: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete the birth chart for "{{chartName}}".

toasts.chartLoadedDescription: Chart "{{chartName}}" has been loaded for editing.
toasts.signInToSave: Please sign in to save your birth data.
toasts.missingInfoToSave: Please fill in name, date, and location to save.
toasts.duplicateEntryDescription: A birth record with identical details already exists.
toasts.deleteSuccessDescription: The selected chart has been deleted.
toasts.missingFields: Please fill in all required fields.
toasts.signInToGenerate: Please sign in to generate your chart.
toasts.invalidChartData: Invalid chart data received from the server. Please check the input and try again.
toasts.chartCalculated: Your birth chart has been calculated.
